metric.Description: Name of the IQM or PC

bias.Description: Mean difference between nondefaced and defaced images

loa_lower.Description: Lower limit of agreement (mean difference - 1.96 * standard deviation)

loa_upper.Description: Upper limit of agreement (mean difference + 1.96 * standard deviation)

ci_lower_param.Description: Lower bound of the parametric 95% confidence interval of the mean difference

ci_upper_param.Description: Upper bound of the parametric 95% confidence interval of the mean difference

ci_lower_non_param.Description: Lower bound of the non-parametric 95% confidence interval of the mean difference

ci_upper_non_param.Description: Upper bound of the non-parametric 95% confidence interval of the mean difference
